citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The facility's current Program of Veterinary care does not include veterinary care information regarding birds and the
attending veterinarian has not conducted regular visits to the site. The current Program of Veterinary care states a
frequency of annual veterinary visits to the facility but according to the facility representative, the attending veterinarian
has not been out in over a year. Additionally, the current program addresses the mammals on site but not the birds that
are being used for exhibition purposes. Having an up-to-date Program of Veterinary Care and consistent visits from the
Attending Veterinarian ensures that the facility knows how to address potential medical concerns and that the Attending
Veterinarian is familiar with the property, enclosures, diet, and care of the animals.
Correct by January 31, 2024 by ensuring the Program of Veterinary Care includes all animals at the facility and the
attending veterinarian is performing regularly scheduled visits to the premises (at minimum annually).

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility does not have an environmental enhancement plan for birds. An environmental enhancement plan must be
developed, documented, and approved by the attending veterinarian so as to promote the health and psychological well-
being of birds.
Correct by December 31, 2023 by ensuring that a complete, documented plan for environmental enhancement that
addresses the required elements, is approved by the attending veterinarian, and is maintained and available for
inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
